message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and rarity.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $800000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1200000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, considering the product's true value and rarity. I hope we can come to an agreement.
